attributes.title: 🟠 must 💀hispanic lives matter
attributes.review: I almost died first my wifi is 💯 percent fine and it took almost a month to download when it finished i opened it and it kept showing my house and a wall next to it then a orange face popped up and i passed out next thing you know i’m in the er thx so much  orange face

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: this app gets all of your information as soon as you download it and uses that information for so much things. they can hack your social media, your card, and your home security just by downloading it. help everyone by giving it 1 star and help it get deleted

attributes.title: disgusting app!!!
attributes.review: so i wanted to download this app simply to learn more about my president mr orange. but when i opened the app my phone started glitching really REALLY BAD. this app blew out my speaker and it is now playing music over and over again and guess WHAT. when my cats looked at the app, it killed them. i do not recommend 🙄🙄

attributes.title: Do not get this app!! Here’s why-
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE! As soon as I got it, it created a virus on my phone! When I tried to restart my phone the virus kept pulling up videos of cats vomiting🤮 It got so bad to the point where I had to work 4+ jobs to purchase a new phone! In conclusion, do NOT get this app. #anyonebuttrump2020

attributes.title: Terrible horrible no good app
attributes.review: The app is almost completely dysfunctional and useless, it glitches nonstop and overwhelms my phone with ridiculous adds. My experience with this app was just all around bad, not to mention the virus it gave my phone. 0/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all the hype was about for the upcoming election. But when it installed on my phone it opened my floor boards and rats started crawling out!!!! For hours they never stopped😡 they ate all of my food and now my family is starving to death. And they stole my dog😭 I cannot explain how terrible this app is!!!

attributes.title: Takes to long worst app ever
attributes.review: I tried to see the merch and even buy some. It took me two weeks to just open the app. Plus the merch looked ratchet. Also the customer service threatened my life by saying that they would take me to the aliens. I rate this app one star because it made me uncomfy🧚‍♂️💅🏻

attributes.title: This app has too many issues to name
attributes.review: The app is a mess, the app is hard to navigate and when I clicked to register for one of the rally’s it downloaded a VIRUS on my apple protected phone “I had to buy a new phone” don’t get this app, it slows down your phone and should be taken off the AppStore

attributes.title: awful app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our lovely president, but this app took literal days to download(and i have very good wifi where i live). also once the app FINALLY downloaded, it made my phone freeze ever time i opened the app. i had to restart my entire phone everytime i opened it.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps ever it takes weeks to load when you try to open it it just says reload to use app and you have to pay $100 a month to use the app I was going to get this app to find a way to like that trump person but it just made me hate if even more DONT AND I MEAN DONT GET THIS APP!!!
